.table mother
----
text/plain

.table father
----
text/plain

mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}.
----
text/propagation-log
from null to mother: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}. 
  mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}

father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}.
----
text/propagation-log
from null to father: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}. 
  father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}

mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}.
----
text/propagation-log
from null to mother: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}. 
  mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}

father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}.
----
text/propagation-log
from null to father: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}. 
  father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}

.rulegraph
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "mother" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="mother:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}, mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
  "father" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="father:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}, father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}]
}

parents{child: C, mother: M, father: F} :-
  mother{child: C, mother: M} &
  father{child: C, father: F}.
----
text/propagation-log
from mother to 0: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}. Match(mother{child: C, mother: M}; {})
  mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}
from 0 to 2: mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}. Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child)
from mother to 0: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}. Match(mother{child: C, mother: M}; {})
  mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}
from 0 to 2: mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}. Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child)
from father to 1: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}. Match(father{child: C, father: F}; {})
  father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul"}
from 1 to 2: father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul"}. Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child)
  parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}
from 2 to parents: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Subst({child: C, father: F, mother: M})
  parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}
from father to 1: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}. Match(father{child: C, father: F}; {})
  father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul"}
from 1 to 2: father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul"}. Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child)
  parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}
from 2 to parents: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Subst({child: C, father: F, mother: M})
  parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}

.rulegraph
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="0: Match(mother{child: C, mother: M}; {}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}, mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
  "1" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="1: Match(father{child: C, father: F}; {}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul"}, father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul"}]
  "2" [fillcolor="thistle" label="2: Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}]
  "mother" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="mother:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}, mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
  "father" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="father:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}, father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}]
  "parents" [fillcolor="lightblue" label="parents: Subst({child: C, father: F, mother: M}) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}]
  "0" -> "2" [];
  "1" -> "2" [];
  "2" -> "parents" [];
  "father" -> "1" [];
  "mother" -> "0" [];
}

sibling{left: L, right: R} :-
  parents{child: L, mother: M, father: F} &
  parents{child: R, mother: M, father: F} &
  L != R.
----
text/propagation-log
from parents to 3: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Match(parents{child: L, father: F, mother: M}; {C: L, F: F, M: M})
  parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary"}
from 3 to 5: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary"}. Join(sibling, F: 4.father = 3.father & M: 4.mother = 3.mother)
from parents to 4: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Match(parents{child: R, father: F, mother: M}; {C: R, F: F, M: M})
  parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}
from 4 to 5: parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}. Join(sibling, F: 4.father = 3.father & M: 4.mother = 3.mother)
  sibling{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}
from 5 to 6: sibling{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}. L != R
from parents to 3: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Match(parents{child: L, father: F, mother: M}; {C: L, F: F, M: M})
  parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}
from 3 to 5: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}. Join(sibling, F: 4.father = 3.father & M: 4.mother = 3.mother)
  sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}
from 5 to 6: sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}. L != R
  sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}
from 6 to sibling: sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}. Subst({left: L, right: R})
  sibling{left: "Carolyn", right: "Pete"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}
from parents to 4: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}. Match(parents{child: R, father: F, mother: M}; {C: R, F: F, M: M})
  parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}
from 4 to 5: parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}. Join(sibling, F: 4.father = 3.father & M: 4.mother = 3.mother)
  sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}
  sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}
from 5 to 6: sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}. L != R
  sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}
from 5 to 6: sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}. L != R
from 6 to sibling: sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}. Subst({left: L, right: R})
  sibling{left: "Pete", right: "Carolyn"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}

.rulegraph
----
application/graphviz
digraph G {
  "0" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="0: Match(mother{child: C, mother: M}; {}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", M: "Mary"}, mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
  "1" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="1: Match(father{child: C, father: F}; {}) [C]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul"}, father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul"}]
  "2" [fillcolor="thistle" label="2: Join(parents, C: 1.child = 0.child) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}]
  "3" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="3: Match(parents{child: L, father: F, mother: M}; {C: L, F: F, M: M}) [M-F]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary"}]
  "4" [fillcolor="darkseagreen2" label="4: Match(parents{child: R, father: F, mother: M}; {C: R, F: F, M: M}) [M-F]" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}]
  "5" [fillcolor="thistle" label="5: Join(sibling, F: 4.father = 3.father & M: 4.mother = 3.mother) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [sibling{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}, sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}, sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}, sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}]
  "6" [fillcolor="darkseagreen1" label="6: L != R []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}, sibling{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}]
  "mother" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="mother:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [mother{child: "Pete", mother: "Mary"}; {}, mother{child: "Carolyn", mother: "Mary"}; {}]
  "father" [fillcolor="darksalmon" label="father:  []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [father{child: "Pete", father: "Paul"}; {}, father{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul"}; {}]
  "parents" [fillcolor="lightblue" label="parents: Subst({child: C, father: F, mother: M}) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [parents{child: "Pete", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Pete", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}, parents{child: "Carolyn", father: "Paul", mother: "Mary"}; {C: "Carolyn", F: "Paul", M: "Mary"}]
  "sibling" [fillcolor="lightblue" label="sibling: Subst({left: L, right: R}) []" shape="box" style="filled"]; // cache: [sibling{left: "Carolyn", right: "Pete"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Carolyn", M: "Mary", R: "Pete"}, sibling{left: "Pete", right: "Carolyn"}; {F: "Paul", L: "Pete", M: "Mary", R: "Carolyn"}]
  "0" -> "2" [];
  "1" -> "2" [];
  "2" -> "parents" [];
  "3" -> "5" [];
  "4" -> "5" [];
  "5" -> "6" [];
  "6" -> "sibling" [];
  "father" -> "1" [];
  "mother" -> "0" [];
  "parents" -> "3" [];
  "parents" -> "4" [];
}
